description: Structured information on a coordinate space.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/anato._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/anato.description: Relation between reference planes used in anatomy and mathematics.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/anato.title: anatomicalAxesOrientation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/axesO._instruction: Enter the origin of the coordinate system (central point where axes intersect; 2D: [x, y] or 3D:[x, y, z]).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/axesO.description: Special point in a coordinate system used as a fixed point of reference for the geometry of the surrounding space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/axesO.title: axesOrigin

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defau._instruction: Add one or several images used as visual representation of this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defau.description: Two or three dimensional image that particluarly represents a specific coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defau.title: defaultImage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.title: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.title: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this brain atlas.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.title: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/nativ._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/nativ.description: Determinate quantity used in the original measurement.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/nativ.title: nativeUnit

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.title: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.title: releaseDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.title: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this coordinate space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.title: versionIdentifier
